Title: Hamster.Net
Description:
Porting the "Java Hamster Model" to the .Net-Framework. This project is far from finished. And will slowly develop further.
The software is currently pre-alpha and not really useful at all, but this will hopefully change soon.

The Hamster Model is a learning environment for programming. A hamster is placed on a territory wich can contain walls and grains. The programmer can use simple commands to navigate the hamster and control its behaivor.
The Hamster Model is quite helpful for learning imperative programming.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Porting the "Java Hamster Model" to the .Net-Framework. This project is far from finished. And will slowly develop further.
The software is currently pre-alpha and not really useful at all, but this will hopefully change soon.

The Hamster Model is a learning environment for programming. A hamster is placed on a territory wich can contain walls and grains. The programmer can use simple commands to navigate the hamster and control its behaivor.
The Hamster Model is quite helpful for learning imperative programming.
